publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-963 Karen Whitefield: St Aloysius Primary School’s 150th Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff at St Aloysius Primary on the school’s 150th anniversary; recognises the significant part that the school has played in enhancing the lives of the children of Chapelhall during that period; further recognises the important role played by the 20 head teachers that the school has had since its inception in providing leadership and guidance to the young people of Chapelhall, and wishes staff and pupils well during their celebrations.
S3M-963 St Aloysius Primary School’s 150th Anniversary (lodged on 3 December 2007) Bashir Ahmad*, Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Kidd*, Karen Gillon*, Alasdair Allan*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-963 St Aloysius Primary School’s 150th Anniversary (lodged on 3 December 2007) Jackie Baillie*, Margaret Mitchell*, Alex Neil*, Joe FitzPatrick*, James Kelly*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-963 St Aloysius Primary School’s 150th Anniversary (lodged on 3 December 2007) Roseanna Cunningham*

S3M-963 Karen Whitefield: St Aloysius Primary School’s 150th Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff at St Aloysius Primary on the school’s 150th anniversary; recognises the significant part that the school has played in enhancing the lives of the children of Chapelhall during that period; further recognises the important role played by the 20 head teachers that the school has had since its inception in providing leadership and guidance to the young people of Chapelhall, and wishes staff and pupils well during their celebrations. Supported by: Bashir Ahmad, Patricia Ferguson, Bill Kidd, Karen Gillon, Alasdair Allan, Hugh O’Donnell, Marilyn Livingstone, Jackie Baillie, Margaret Mitchell, Alex Neil, Joe FitzPatrick, James Kelly, Cathy Peattie, Roseanna Cunningham, Elaine Smith*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-963 St Aloysius Primary School’s 150th Anniversary (lodged on 3 December 2007) Cathie Craigie*
S3M-963 St Aloysius Primary School’s 150th Anniversary (lodged on 3 December 2007) Michael McMahon*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-963 St Aloysius Primary School’s 150th Anniversary (lodged on 3 December 2007) Trish Godman*
